name: Conways Game Of Life (OneEgg42)
description:
a remake of my Game of life that I made in C++ but this time, it's in java.

Sorry that the game window takes a few seconds to open - I'm trying to fix that. If you have java installed you can navigate into the bin folder inside runtime folder to run the conwaysJar.jar and that doesn't have any window loading issues. I'm really not sure why the exe is slow to open the window compared to the jar because they are the exact same application.
